name: Tweets analysis tryout
tagline: Scripts of my try out at Tweets analysis
body:
# Trying out vairous analysis on Tweets

This is just a simple repository of my attempt at analysing Tweets.  

### Files:  
db2df - script to retrieve data (tweets) from MongoDB into Python pandas dataframe  
onp_01_sentiment_afinn - sentiment measurement of tweets with weighted sentiment words from AFINN  
onp_02_wc - various word clouds of the tweets  
[onp_03_topic_modelling](https://github.com/n-lo/Tweets_analysis_tryout/blob/master/docs/onp_03_topic_modelling.html) - attempt at topic modelling, does not take into account of common phrases (this in next part)  
[onp_04_topic_modelling_phrases](https://github.com/n-lo/Tweets_analysis_tryout/blob/master/docs/onp_04_topic_modelling_phrases.html) - also topic modelling, but this time take into account of common phrases
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
